text: Ezɨ Johanan ko Gedalia uaningra itir dughiamɨn, Johanan nɨmɨra kamaghɨn Gedalian mɨgei, “Ga uaning. Nɨ na ateghtɨ kɨ mangɨ Ismael mɨsueghtɨ ana aremeka. Gumazitam bizir kam gɨfoghan kogham. Nɨ aneteghtɨ a nɨ mɨsueghtɨ, nɨ aremeghtɨ, Judan datɨrɨghɨn iza nɨ akuvagha itiba, me tintinibar mangegham. Eghtɨ en gumazamizir ikiavɨra itir varazira, e bar ikuvigham.”
